title: Has anyone got the Hextech ward yet?
body: A lot of people are loving on Hextech Annie, but no one talks about the ward. Has anyone got it yet? I don't even like Annie that much so I would rather get the ward.

replies.body: Didn't know there was a ward for hex? What's it look like?
I recently saw a guy in bronze with both, the amount of luck is absurd (unless they blew 30 bones on keys and boxes
I got a Sad Mummy Ward. That's about it, hoping for a different one.
